name: Death of a Pixel
description:
Death of a Pixel is a game about life, death, and transcendence. Starting with a pixel dying and falling from its place, it ends up in the underworld and seeks to regain its powers (color!) to regain its former brilliant glory. Simple platforming is accompanied by haunting piano pieces and classic sound fx to bring the pixel world to life as the pixel tries to make its way back home.

Controls: A, D to move. W to activate/use.
(Alternative: Left/Right Arrows, Space to use)
